message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get $60, you get $40. Deal?
Alice, my turn.  I'll take a slight advantage this round, considering you got greedy last time. Let's be reasonable, this deal benefits us both.
Bob, let's be real. You're losing value every round. I'll give you $45, that's more than you'd get if you stall.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  The longer we drag this out, the less we both get. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
